title: WATCH: 40 outrageous food combinations to try before you die
text:
We all have our favourite food combos and it is almost impossible to imagine life without them.

Peanut butter obviously goes with jam and there is nothing better than avo on toast, but there are some combinations that just make you cringe when you think of them.

WATCH: Taste of Radisson: The hotel group that loves to feed you

What if we told you that some of the strangest combinations make for the best foods like hot Cheetos on pizza or a banana and bacon sandwich. Take a look at what different food establishments around the globe give their customers to try.

Find Your Escape by signing up for the Traveller24 Weekly Newsletter – Subscribe here. Or download the News24 App here, to receive expertly curated travel ideas and deals directly to your mobile.
description: Fish and chips go together and so does salt and pepper, here are some weird but oddly good combinations.
